0.1.name: wordpress/affiliate-manager
0.1.description: The Affiliate Manager will easily import Market Leverage ad banner campaigns, display them, and rotate them. Provide keywords for products related to your blog, and the plugin will automatically load the banners into WordPress. You can display banners by modifying your template code, disiplaying them in widgets, or both. The plugin requires cURL to work properly.
